sentences.sContent: One piece was the harpsichord part for the Concerto in G (molto allegro) and the other was the Prelude in G major.
sentences.sContent_eng: One piece was the harpsichord part for the Concerto in G (molto allegro) and the other was the Prelude in G major.
sentences.sCn: 一件是G大调协奏曲的大提琴部分，另外一件是G大调协奏曲的序曲。

sentences.sContent: There are also 19 harpsichord suites and several variation sets.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are also 19 harpsichord suites and several variation sets.
sentences.sCn: 还有19间套房和大键琴套几个变化。

trans.tranOther: a musical instrument like a piano, used especially in the past
